title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API that lets you download, create, and run Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API; installable via PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter providing Ollama LLM & embeddings components; install via pip.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker or locally.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built Node CLI that wraps Ollama endpoints for quick chatting & model ops.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS-Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + LangChain + Chroma for local Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples for running Ollama server plus CUDA acceleration.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Android compatible) published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-chat (React component)
summary: Reusable React component that provides a ChatGPT-like interface backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to answer questions with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat powered by any Ollama model.
